content.rendered:
Enter your information below
to get best deals from 1Park Avenue








    1Park Avenue

    The Best Luxury Apartment in Jakarta

    Picking a nice luxury apartment can seem overwhelming. There is a lot to consider and hard to narrow down. However, once you discover the best apartment in Jakarta, you won´t look no further. Living in a high-rise building does not always feel like you´re being cast out from the rest. If you think that there´s no place in South Jakarta that could give you the Zen moment, you haven´t seen the luxury apartments Intiland has brought to you.

    1Park Avenue turns apartment to a luxurious cozy home filled with an incredibly refreshing garden to call yours! This is the best apartment in Jakarta designed with holistic approach that´s not only a premium living space, but strategically situated at the heart of the city. 1Park Avenue is located in Gandaria, Kebayoran Baru – a fast growing business district attached to 5-star hotels, shopping malls and other commercial buildings. Call it a condominium or luxury apartments, this Jakarta real estate is unlike any other home you see. The soothing environment improves your living as it is heavily associated with lush greens surrounded by water landscape.

    The Best Apartment in Jakarta that Lets You Explore the City Conveniently

    One thing to note when looking for luxury apartments. Location does matter. Set in a bustling area of Gandaria, Kebayoran Baru – this Jakarta real estate has an easy access to CBD and is close to some of the upscale shopping malls in Jakarta, such as Plaza Senayan, Pondok Indah Mall, Senayan City and Gandaria City. The residential complex is within walking distance from Blok M MRT station. This gives the residents plenty of options to travel and explore the city.

    Jakarta Real Estate Facilities for Your Convenience

    1Park Avenue is actually a city of its own. There´s nothing that you cannot find in the luxury apartments. For sports enthusiasts, there are a few courts to try, from mini soccer, basketball to tennis. A fully-equipped fitness center can help you shape up at any day. The jogging track offers an amazing view of the water ponds and greens, and the elderly can take advantage of the healthy stone walking area.

    There are residents lounge and BBQ area that enable you to socialize and create an event; or use the multi function room for your next business meeting. The tropical weather makes swimming pools an oasis. Dip yourself in the refreshing swimming pool or have fun with your family at the kid´s pool and children playground. There are also food and beverage tenants ready to fix your craving at any time.

    Pick Your Luxury Apartments Today and Enjoy Living Fabulously in the Best Jakarta Real Estate!

    Choose your dream home from these three suites, all of which, are fully furnished.

    • 3 bedroom suites (177 m2)
    • 2+1 bedroom suites (146 m2)
    • 2 bedroom suites (137.5 m2)

    The unit features a semi-private open air lift lobby. Once you enter your luxury apartments, you will be greeted by the breathtaking panorama of the city and water view. To add luxury in your Jakarta real estate living; every suite uses marble and laminated parquet flooring with built-in wardrobe in the master bedroom. A sleek and elegant fitted kitchen ensures you have a great time cooking for your loved ones.

    For your ultimate dream house, 1Park Avenue has prepared semi furnished luxury apartments in two towers dedicated those who prefer to arrange their own space according to their likings. What about the safety in this Jakarta real estate? A fully equipped security system consists of automated devices, international standard full fire prevention system, CCTV and security personnel that guards the property for 24 hours.

    The Best Buy for Jakarta Real Estate

    With a broad range of selections, it is now easy to opt for an apartment that feels like a landed-house. Envision a life full of comfort in cutting-edge luxury apartments while still getting in touch with the nature´s beauty. Invest in the best apartment in Jakarta and contact us for more information about 1Park Avenue!
